name: @misk/common
description: Microservice Kontainer Common Libraries, Externals, Styles
author: Square/Misk Authors (https://github.com/square/misk/graphs/contributors)

scripts.dev: yarn run lib; yarn run updateDevCache
scripts.docker-build: yarn run refresh; node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --config webpack.config.js && node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --config webpack.config.static.js && node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --config webpack.config.vendors.js
scripts.ci-build: yarn install && yarn clean && yarn build
scripts.lib: yarn run refresh; webpack --config webpack.config.js && webpack --config webpack.config.static.js && webpack --config webpack.config.vendors.js
scripts.prepare: yarn run lint && yarn run test && yarn run lib
